1887 N284 Buchner SGC-authentics SOLD!
Have over 100 Buchners & these 2 authentics are as bright & vibrant as can be.
Many in my set have dull washed out color, these look great.
Fresh from SGC, they arrived this morning

The SGC pop report shows just one other Mulvey (Hands above head) which is in my set, the Dan Casey has a pop of 5, this auth, my SGC-30 and 3 others

If interested, PM or Email me at [URL="jaycos@qualitycards.com"]jaycos@qualitycards.com[/URL]

[IMG]http://www.qualitycards.com/pictures/1374077002.jpg[/IMG]
Surprised these lasted as long as they did!  BEAUTIFUL cards.
